en.h1: All-in-One Dashboard For Managing All the Sales on your Social Media
dashboard: for managing all of your online sales activities
There are many functions that can help you increase your sales!
avachat: helps you respond to all of the comments you received while you are actively going live on Facebook - especially to the ones who are interested in purchasing the products you are promoting at that time.
This feature has numerous benefits that can improve sales while you're on Facebook live.
Buyers can get the answer right away
They can also buy products directly at the live session
There is no need to pay additional staff to respond to the comments during the live session
reseller: With this function, you can see the performance of your reseller directly.
webstore: for your online store / brand / product and choose your own domain.com
The website we provide you has many functions that can help your customers buy online.
fbshop: Turn your Facebook Page followers into subscribers. They can buy your product directly on your Facebook Page without having to go to another site.
en.support: AVANA has partnered with various logistics & e-payment systems
en.testimonial: What our sellers said after joining AVANA?
footerCta: FREE 14 DAYS TRIAL ☻ Try Now for FREE!

bm.h1: Satu dashboard untuk menguruskan semua penjualan di media sosial anda
dashboard: pintar untuk menguruskan semua aktiviti jualan online anda
Ada banyak fungsi-fungsi yang dapat membantu meningkatkan jualan anda!
avachat: memudahkan anda mendapatkan jualan ketika sesi Live di Facebook Pages berlangsung
Fungsi ini dapat menjimatkan masa anda untuk menjawab semua komen & memudahkan pelanggan membuat pembelian ketika sesi Live sedang berlangsung.
Pelanggan boleh beli produk anda pada sesi LIVE itu juga
Set ‘keyword’ untuk jawab komen secara automatik
Hantar mesej kepada pelanggan secara automatik
reseller: Dengan fungsi ini, anda boleh melihat prestasi reseller anda secara langsung.
webstore: untuk kedai online/jenama/produk anda dan pilih sendiri domain.com anda
Website yang kami sediakan mempunyai banyak fungsi yang dapat membantu pelanggan anda membeli online.
fbshop: Ubah followers Facebook Pages anda menjadi pelanggan. Mereka boleh membeli produk terus Facebook Pages anda tanpa perlu membuka laman web lain.
bm.support: AVANA menjalinkan kerjasama strategik dengan pelbagai pihak
bm.testimonial: Apa kata mereka yang sudah menggunakan AVANA?
